metamaskAddressNotCorrect: Please make sure that the correct wallet address is selected in Metamask.
withdrawProhibited: Withdrawal Prohibited : All Token Balance must be larger than Zero
withdrawFailed: Withdrawal Failed : Input Amount Larger than Avaliable
depositFailed: Deposit Failed : Input Amount Larger than Avaliable
enterReferralCodeDescription: Enter referral code and you can invite your friends
getFundingDescription: Get 10x funding, and trade on the most funded decentralised crypto trading protocol
MSTDescription: Mappedswap Token (MST) is the backbone of Mappedswap Protocol
netAgentFeeIncome: Net Gain on Friends' Transction Fee (C=E-G)
netAgentInterestIncome: Net Gain on Friends' Interest Fee (D=F-H)
expectedCommission: Your Expected Commission For This Week
name: Name
referralDescriptionOne: Mappedswap’s Referral Program adopts an unlimited hierarchical model. The referrer not only earns a commission directly from referred users but also can indefinitely trace the transaction volume of indirectly referred users to boost the referrer’s rebate level and commission. As long as your rebate level is high, you can earn crypto assets without making any transaction! Invite your friends to trade now!
referralDescriptionTwo: The referral model: for example, if A refers B and C, B refers E and F, while C refers G, H, and so on… Then B and C are the directly referred users of A, whereas E, F, G, H… are the indirectly referred users of A.
miningDescriptionOne: Earn MappedSwap Tokens (MST) by staking USDC, wBTC, and ETH from Ethereum Network to add liquidity to Pools!
miningDescriptionTwo: 1. Initial Reward: 1 Billion MST are used to incentivize the liquidity providers of USDC, wBTC, and ETH Pools on a first come first serve basis!
miningDescriptionThree: $600 Million MST will be rewarded to the liquidity providers of the first $600 Million USDC.
miningDescriptionFour: $200 Million MST will be rewarded to the liquidity providers of the first $200 Million wBTC.
miningDescriptionFive: $200 Million MST will be rewarded to the liquidity providers of the first $200 Million ETH.
miningDescriptionSix: There will be a 2-Year Lockup Period for the liquidity providers who want to earn the Initial Rewards, providers who do not prefer a Lockup period will have to wait till the liquidity exceeds the 1 Billion threshold. Subsequent stakes will not be tied up with any Lockup period.
miningDescriptionSeven: 2. Subsequent Reward: An extra $200 Million worth of MST is used to incentivize all liquidity providers, on a weekly basis, from 14 February 2022 to 13 February 2023!
miningDescriptionEight: $120 Million MST will be rewarded to the liquidity providers of USDC pool.
miningDescriptionNine: $40 Million MST will be rewarded to the liquidity providers of ETH pool.
miningDescriptionTen: ＊Please note that for any withdrawal, there will be a 7-day waiting period before the funds arrive in your wallet.
miningDescriptionEleven: $40 Million MST will be rewarded to the liquidity providers of wBTC pool.
lockupPeriodReminder: *Please note that the 100% Initial Reward of MST will be auto-staked into Referral Program to boost your Rebate Level. Every Monday (UTC+8), 2% of your MST is available for withdrawal on the Referral page until all of your MST rewards are claimed. On the same day, you can use the “Claim Rewards” button on the Stake page to get your Staking Rewards.
rewardAmountReminder: ＊Please note that there will be a 7-day waiting period for any withdrawal.
rebateCalculationDescriptionOne: Example, A refers B and C, but A does not trade, A’s Rebate is:
rebateCalculationDescriptionTwo: User A Rebate = User A’s（Transaction Fee + Interest Fee）* A’s Rebate Level +User B’s and his directly/indirectly referred users’（Transaction Fee + Interest Fee） * A & B’s Rebate Level Spread + User C’s and his directly/indirectly referred users’（Transaction Fee + Interest Fee） * A & C’s Rebate Level Spread
rebateTableDescriptionOne: Remark 1: Weekly Vol. = Transaction Volume from You + Transaction Volume from directly/indirectly referred users
rebateTableDescriptionTwo: For example: A refers B, B refers C, C refers D
rebateTableDescriptionThree: A’s weekly Volume = A + (B + C + D +….)
rebateTableDescriptionFive: Remark 2: MST staking/unstaking affects the rebate level immediately. A 7-day redemption period for unstaking MST
treasuryFundDescriptionOne: All the income (including the transaction fee and borrowing fee incurred by protocol users) will enter into the treasury fund of MappedSwap Protocol. The treasury fund acts as:
treasuryFundDescriptionTwo: Main backstop collateral vault: pay for all levered losses incurred by protocol users. The Protocol will maintain a fund of 80million in value to prevent bankruptcies and ensure that all positions are made whole
treasuryFundDescriptionThree: Friends referral program payer: pay the rebates to the referrers for any successful referrals according to the Protocol’s Referral Program
treasuryFundDescriptionFour: MappedSwap Token (MST) buyback executer: buyback MST from the open market using excess assets in the fund (50% of excess assets before collateral vault reaches 80 million in value; 100% of excess assets after collateral vault reaches 80 million).
networkGuideNotification: Please visit our website to learn how to setup the network in Metamask.
learnMoreAvailableFunding: Available Funding of the user will be Total Funding deducting Used Funding.
learnMoreTotalFunding: Total Funding of the user will be 10 times the Equity Value in the user’s account of MappedSwap based on USD. It will govern the maximum amount of crypto assets that can be borrowed by a single user.
learnMoreRiskLevel1: Risk Level = 1 – Equity x 10 / Used Funding = (Used Funding – Total Funding) / Used Funding = - Available Funding / Used Funding
learnMoreRiskLevel2: When the risk level reaches 80%, liquidation will be triggered and the Protocol would convert all non-USD positions into USD.
learnMoreBorrowingRate: Simple interest on any borrowed asset shall accrue every hour. Hourly Interest = Borrowed Amount of the Asset * Hourly Interest rate of the Asset.
learnMoreBorrowing: The amount you automatically borrow to execute the order.
learnMoreRepay: The amount you automatically repay after executing the order.
learnMorePriceShock: The impact on protocol's price after executing the order.
learnMoreTransactionFee: Transaction fee is charged on a per swap trade basis and calculated based on 0.3% on the sold assets size and is taken directly from the swap trade.
inputDateError: Selected Date Must NOt Later than today
campaignTitle1: SHARE, TRADE AND WIN FROM A 200,000 MST PRIZE POOL
campaignTitle2: Putting Margin Trading on the Map
campaignTask1Content1: Share your unique referral code ＆ link on your social media accounts to earn 5 USDM!
campaignTask1Content2: Users must submit a screen capture of their post to be eligible.
campaignTask2Content1: Make an accumulative trade of 1000 USD in value and receive 50 MST!
campaignTask3Content1: After 2 weeks after the start of this promotion, users with a cumulative profit & loss of 10,000 USD will receive 500 MST as a reward.
campaignTask3Content2: (Mid stop day is 28 April 2022, ending at 10pm, UTC+8)
leaderboardHeader: Leaderboard for 200,000 MST prize pool ending on 12 May 2022 (UTC+8)
usdcWithdrawAlert: The chosen option will convert your USD assets into USDC and charge a withdrawal fee of $30 USD.
usdcWithdrawAmountEnoughMsg: The amount doesn't achieve the minimum limit of withdrawal.
